section.heading: Tenant hot line.
section.text: The Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs shall provide for the continuation of a tenant hot line. The primary purpose of the tenant hot line is to provide assistance to low- and moderate-income tenants. To carry out this purpose, the functions and responsibilities shall include, but not be limited to, the following:

para.text: Answering rent control procedural questions, and directing tenants toward possible courses of action in resolving problems;
Providing advice on housing regulation violations;
Providing guidance on the Tenant Assistance Program;
Providing guidance in resolving problems involving water, heating, repairs, and other matters;
Providing advice on possible action in response to allegations of discrimination, harassment, or neglect by housing providers;
Answering preliminary questions about remedies through the courts;
Providing guidance when tenants are faced with eviction; and
Providing guidance on other tenant problems.
